com.mambu.apisdk.services
Class SavingsService

java.lang.Object
  com.mambu.apisdk.services.SavingsService

public class SavingsService
extends java.lang.Object

Service class which handles API operations like retrieval, creation or changing state of savings accounts

ipenciuc

                                                                                                throws MambuApiException
Get Savings Account Transactions by an account id and offset and limit

Parameters:
accountId - the id of the account
offset - first transaction number
limit - last transaction number Note: if offset and limit both equal null, all transactions are returned (Note: transaction are sorted by date)
Returns:
the list of savings transactions
Throws:
MambuApiException

                                                                                                            java.lang.String offset,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String limit)
                                                                                                     throws MambuApiException
Get the Savings accounts by branch is, credit officer, accountState

Parameters:
branchId - The ID of the branch to which the accounts are assigned to
creditOfficerUserName - the username of the credit officer to whom the accounts are assigned to
accountState - the state of the accounts to filter on (eg: APPROVED)
Returns:
the list of Savings accounts matching these parameters
Throws:
MambuApiException

createAccount

public com.mambu.api.server.handler.savings.model.JSONSavingsAccount createAccount(com.mambu.api.server.handler.savings.model.JSONSavingsAccount savingsAccount)
                                                                            throws MambuApiException
Create a new JSONSavingsAccount using JSONSavingsAccount object and sending it via the JSON API. This API allows creating JSONSavingsAccount with details, including creating custom field values.

Parameters:
savingsAccount -
Returns:
SavingsAccount Note: only the basic details for the custom fields are returned on success. To get full details a user must invoke getSavingsAccountDetails() after the JSONSavingsAccount was created.
Throws:
MambuApiException
